original_text: And for the west side were hangings of fifty cubits, their ten pillars, and their ten bases; the hooks of the pillars and their fillets were of silver.
korean_text: 주위에 포장은 쉰 규빗이라 그 기둥이 열이요 받침이 열이며 기둥의 갈고리와 가름대는 은이며

sentences.original_text: And for the west side were hangings of fifty cubits
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 서쪽에는 오십 규빗 길이의 휘장이 있었고

sentences.original_text: and their fillets were of silver
